verses.text: \w For|strong="H3588"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w doth|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w stay|strong="H4937"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w staff|strong="H4938"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w stay|strong="H4937"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w stay|strong="H4937"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*;

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w ruined|strong="H3782"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*; \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w doings|strong="H4611"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w against|strong="H4784"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w provoke|strong="H4784"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w show|strong="H5046"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w* \w doth|strong="H6440"\w* \w witness|strong="H6030"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*; \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w hide|strong="H3582"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*. Say ye \w of|strong="H6529"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \add it shall be\add* \w well|strong="H2896"\w* \add with him\add*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H6662"\w* eat \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H6529"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*.

\w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w standeth|strong="H5975"\w* \w up|strong="H5975"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w contend|strong="H7378"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w standeth|strong="H5975"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w judge|strong="H1777"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* enter \w into|strong="H4941"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w thereof|strong="H4941"\w*: \w It|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* ye \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w eaten|strong="H1197"\w* \w up|strong="H1197"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*; \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoil|strong="H1500"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*:

what mean \w ye|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w ye|strong="H6440"\w* \w crush|strong="H1792"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w grind|strong="H2912"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*? \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w*, \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w Moreover|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* said, \w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w haughty|strong="H1361"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w outstretched|strong="H5186"\w* \w necks|strong="H1627"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w wanton|strong="H8265"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w walking|strong="H1980"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w mincing|strong="H2952"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* making \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w tinkling|strong="H5913"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*;

\w therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* smite \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w scab|strong="H5596"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w crown|strong="H6936"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w head|strong="H6936"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w lay|strong="H6168"\w* \w bare|strong="H6168"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* secret \w parts|strong="H6596"\w*.

the hand-mirrors, \w and|strong="H5466"\w* the fine \w linen|strong="H5466"\w*, \w and|strong="H5466"\w* the \w turbans|strong="H6797"\w*, \w and|strong="H5466"\w* the \w veils|strong="H7289"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8242"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H8478"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w*, \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w instead|strong="H8478"\w* \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w sweet|strong="H1314"\w* \w spices|strong="H1314"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H8478"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w rottenness|strong="H4716"\w*; \w and|strong="H8242"\w* \w instead|strong="H8478"\w* \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w girdle|strong="H2290"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w rope|strong="H5364"\w*; \w and|strong="H8242"\w* \w instead|strong="H8478"\w* \w of|strong="H8478"\w* well \w set|strong="H4639"\w* \w hair|strong="H4748"\w*, \w baldness|strong="H7144"\w*; \w and|strong="H8242"\w* \w instead|strong="H8478"\w* \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* robe, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w girding|strong="H4228"\w* \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*; \w branding|strong="H3587"\w* \w instead|strong="H8478"\w* \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w*.

\w Thy|strong="H2719"\w* \w men|strong="H4962"\w* \w shall|strong="H2719"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w by|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H5307"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w thy|strong="H2719"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1369"\w* \w in|strong="H4421"\w* \w the|strong="H5307"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.
